author: Andrew W.K.
quote: ANYONE WHO SAYS THAT MONEY CANNOT BUY HAPPINESS HAS CLEARLY NEVER SPENT THEIR MONEY ON PIZZA.

author: Kevin James
quote: THERE’S NO BETTER FEELING IN THE WORLD THAN A WARM PIZZA BOX IN YOUR LAP.

author: Charles Pierce
quote: THE PERFECT LOVER IS ONE WHO TURNS INTO A PIZZA AT 4:00 A.M.

author: Neil Patrick Harris
quote: BUT MAGIC IS LIKE PIZZA: EVEN WHEN IT’S BAD, IT’S PRETTY GOOD.

author: Gwen Stefani
quote: YOU KNOW WHAT? PART OF ME JUST WANTS TO EAT A PIZZA AND GO TO SLEEP.

author: Bill Murray
quote: UNLESS YOU ARE A PIZZA, THE ANSWER IS YES, I CAN LIVE WITHOUT YOU.
